author: Leigh Beadon
description: Five Years Ago This week in 2020, we took a look at tech in the pandemic, from the big ways people were using it to stay connected to the strange details like Fox putting fake videogame crowds in sports broadcasts and how it was finally forcing Hollywood to change some practices. The House Judiciary Committee […]
title: This Week In Techdirt History: July 27th – August 2nd

author: Timothy Geigner
description: This isn’t going to stop happening unless governments finally get involved to do their most basic job: protect their citizens. This habit among digital and tech companies of selling a thing only to claw back some of the function of that thing after the purchase is both rampant and, frankly, getting ridiculous. It’s bad enough […]
title: Smart Home Device Maker Renders Devices Dumb Unless A New Subscription Is Paid For
